fastaUploader.title: Drag and drop to upload .fasta file!
fastaUploader.subtitle: ...or click to select a .fasta file from your computer

fastaValidator.title: Fasta file visualization
fastaValidator.subtitle:
Once you choose a fasta file you will see in this box the selected sequence, it's name and also it's length.
For flanking sequences you will see as highlighted the part that will be taken into account for the analysis.
fastaValidator.successfulMessageTitle: Well done! This is a valid fasta file
fastaValidator.errorMessageTitle: Oops! This is not a valid fasta file
fastaValidator.labelSuggetionsTitle: Please check out the following suggestions:
fastaValidator.labelSuggetion2: The file should not be empty.
fastaValidator.labelSuggetion3: All comments should start with ">" character.
fastaValidator.labelSuggetion4: Outside a comment, the only allowed characters are:

headers.ErrorMessage: Sorry, unable to copy to clipboard.

home.welcomeDescription:
The tool allows to perform on the sequences to detect desired and undesired characteristics during the 
 iterative design process. It is explained in general what is the objective of applying each 
 none of the methods and the fundamentals in which The details of how the different resources are integrated in the context of our application are presented, representing their results in the scoring scheme of our method. 
 
The set of evaluations described corresponds to this first version of our Therefore, it does not represent an exhaustive or final set, but rather a first stage that should be analyzed and modified in a logical way according to the results obtained.
home.moreMessage: To know in more details about the process, click the button below

about.title: About us
about.description:
The Patena Community is a group formed by two institutions: The University of Buenos Aires, the University of La Plata. 
 
Who work here we do it guided by the principles and values that our founder transmitted to us, and mobilized for the only transcendent purpose that marks the direction of our Institutions.

notFound.title: 404 - Page not found
notFound.description: The page you requested could not be found. Is there any chance you were looking for one of these?
notFound.getResult: Check the result of an analysis or design

result.title: View Result
result.label: Enter your order number to continue
result.unknownOrderNumber: The requested order number was not found. Please try another one.
result.inActionOrderNumber: Your order is being processed right now. Results will be ready very soon.
result.pendingOrderNumber: it is in the pending queue.
result.unknownOrderNumberHeader: Are you sure it is correct?
result.cancelledOrderNumberHeader: Sorry, on several occasions your order ended with errors.
result.pendingOrderNumberHeader: Your order has not yet been processed

analyzeSuccess.title: Analyze Linker
analyzeSuccess.fileReceived: We have successfully received your file
analyzeSuccess.emailSent: In addition we just sent an email to
analyzeSuccess.notify: When your request is done you will received a notification email in order to see the results.
analyzeSuccess.suggestion: We strongly recommend to keep this order number and we thank you for using PATENA

design.title: Design a linker
design.stStep: What would you like to design ?
design.ndStepSequence: What starting data do you have?
design.rdStepNothing: Which is the distance between the amino acid do you want to link ?
design.rdStepAlertNothing: By not having an initial sequence the system will assign a random sequence
design.rdStepISFS: Which are your flanking and initial sequences?
design.label: Length calculation

patenaSettings.title: Which Patena's settings do you prefer?
patenaSettings.selectNetCharge: Select within the range a value for net charge
patenaSettings.aminoAcidWarning: Take into account that all frequencies must sum 100% together
patenaSettings.netChargeWarning: Net charge could be zero, a postive or negative integer and it's module could not be higher than the sequence length.
patenaSettings.algorithmWarning: At least one algorithm should remain active. Take into account that some algorithms would require some time to work.
patenaSettings.labelCheckNetCharge: I want to select a specific net charge

footer.terms: The University of Buenos Aires is a public research university in Buenos Aires, Argentina. Established in 1821, it is the main institution of higher education in the country and in 2020 it was considered the most prestigious university in Latin America.
